points.text: Sign up for your faculty-specific Smart Start program. Registration opens Friday, June 30.
Attend your faculty-specific iBegin orientation (July 26 to August 4).
Attend your faculty-specific Smart Start program (August 21 to September 1).
Student Accessibility Services hosts transition evening for parents (August 21) and Summer Transition Program (August 22 to 24).
Attend September Orientation and meet new friends on Tuesday, September 5 and Wednesday, September 6.
